Transcription for 1003581

Let us pray.
O God, we thank you for hearts to love, for voices to praise, for a fellowship that cherishes
a priceless heritage and a living hope.
Accept the praise we bring, the friendships that we celebrate today.
Melody our lives that every day and in every way we may live in harmony with your will
and way.
To the honor of Jesus Christ, the pioneer of our faith, we pray.
Amen.
